code: export var isAdmin=function isAdmin(token){return fetch("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/auth/isAdmin"),{method:"GET",headers:{Accept:"Application/json","Content-Type":"Application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(res){return res.json();}).catch(function(err){return{message:"ERROR IS ADMIN"};});};export var forgotPassword=function forgotPassword(email){return fetch("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/auth/forgot-password?email=").concat(email),{method:"GET",headers:{Accept:"Application/json","Content-Type":"Application/json"}}).then(function(res){return res.json();}).catch(function(err){return{message:"ERROR FORGOT PASSWORD"};});};export var resestPassword=function resestPassword(resetCode,pwd){return fetch("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/auth/reset-password"),{method:"POST",headers:{Accept:"Application/json","Content-Type":"Application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({resetCode:resetCode,pwd:pwd})}).then(function(res){return res.json();}).catch(function(err){return{message:"ERROR RESET PASSWORD"};});};
